content:
/>
VI.ii.4.A.2.h
.
Notifying Insurance Service of an Election or Waiver of VA Benefits
Follow the procedures in
M21-1, Part V, Subpart iv, 1.D.2.c
to notify Insurance Service of an election or waiver of VA benefits.
title: M21-1, Part VI, Subpart ii, Chapter 4, Section A - Elections and Waivers in Military Retired Pay (MRP) Cases
citation: Part VI, Subpart ii, Chapter 4, Section A
